ygData.subject: RE: Lined Vials
ygData.msgSnippet: No, we don t.  Only regular vials are needed to produce Thickened or Cloudy Mana. Calbasil Psyrex of Ak Anon (Bertoxx) Enchanter of the 32nd Level House of
ygData.messageBody:
No, we don't. Only regular vials are needed to produce Thickened or Cloudy
Mana.

Calbasil Psyrex of Ak'Anon (Bertoxx)
Enchanter of the 32nd Level
House of Silmindo

Master Baker
Master Brewer
Master Beggar
Master Fisher
Master Jeweler
Master Smith
Senior Journeyman Tailor
Journeyman Tinker

High Master of doing anything to waste my hard earned cash and avoid
spending time leveling :)



At 04:02 PM 11/23/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
>I thought enchanters only needed regular vials. They use lined too??
>
>Tanana (Bristlebane)
>Master Brewer
>Master Potter
>Master Beggar
>
